projectDescription: Built a multi-role agricultural marketplace connecting farmers, buyers, and agents. Features product listing, order management, and role-based dashboards. I contributed to requirement analysis, UI/UX, and authentication flows while participating in team meetings and planning.
features: Multi-role platform: farmers, buyers, and agents with dedicated dashboards.
Product listing, order management, and role-based access control.
Team collaboration: requirement analysis, meetings, and planning.

projectDescription: A fintech web platform simulating real banking features including money transfers, payment handling, and user transaction management. Built to demonstrate secure flows and a production-like banking UI.
features: Send money, request money, withdraw, and payments.
User transaction management and secure authentication.

projectDescription: ElevateEx connects students, instructors, and admins. Students enroll in courses and track progress. Instructors create and submit courses. Admins manage users and content. ElevateEx enhances learning with a user-friendly interface.
features: Three user types: admin, instructor, student â€” each with a functional dashboard.
Students access approved courses, enroll, and track progress in their dashboard.
Apply-to-be-admin flow for instructors/general users via profile sidebar.

projectDescription: Trip_Flip is a hotel management web application for exploring and booking hotel services worldwide. Users sign up, book rooms, manage bookings, and share experiences through a user-friendly interface.
features: Sign up with credentials or Google/GitHub. Book rooms and edit booking info.
After checkout, post a review that appears on the home and rooms pages.

projectDescription: Artisan Haven showcases textile art and craft. Artists display work; enthusiasts explore crafts. Features category-based browsing and user-contributed gallery management.
features: View arts and crafts by category. Register to add, edit, update, or delete your crafts.
